item.description: Come play board games, pool and ping pong with us. I have scrabble and upwords, so if you would like to play something else, please bring it. Let’s share in a “pot luck” dinner, bring a healthy side dish, grill item (on my gas stove) and your favorite beverage. Lets have FUN despite storm Bill!
item.how_to_find_us: The 12 story apartment building is between Asylum St. (St. Francis Hospital) and Farmington Ave. Parking is in the front and on the side street. Security guard will need your license plate number and will ring me up.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Game and Food Event
